column5: This Mid-Century home is a perfect place to relax, entertain and have family time. It has the vintage charm coupled with modern amenities for a young or older family. The house is two blocks from the Clear Lake Bay, one block from the neighborhood pool and splash pad, 30 minutes from Galveston, 40 minutes from Downtown Houston and close to everything in between. If you want to enjoy modern day pleasures, book a stay!
